xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content: # Class fields Scheduler.LDAP.OldUserCleanupJob_ldapBindDn=LDAP bind user Scheduler.LDAP.OldUserCleanupJob_ldapBindPass=LDAP bind password Scheduler.LDAP.OldUserCleanupJob_replacementUser=Replacement User Scheduler.LDAP.OldUserCleanupJob_replacementAdmin=Replacement Admin Scheduler.LDAP.OldUserCleanupJob_replaceCreator=Replace creator? Scheduler.LDAP.OldUserCleanupJob_replaceAuthor=Replace author? Scheduler.LDAP.OldUserCleanupJob_replaceContentAuthor=Replace content author? Scheduler.LDAP.OldUserCleanupJob_replaceCommentAuthor=Replace comment author? Scheduler.LDAP.OldUserCleanupJob_dryRun=Dry run Scheduler.LDAP.OldUserCleanupJob_shouldDisable=Should disable instead of delete Scheduler.LDAP.OldUserCleanupJob_activeAttribute=Active Attribute Scheduler.LDAP.OldUserCleanupJob_inactiveValue=Inactive Value # hints org.xwiki.contrib.ldap.scheduler.LDAP.OldUserCleanupJob.ldapBindDn.hint=The DN or name of the user to bind to the LDAP when running the job. ## currently unused #org.xwiki.contrib.ldap.scheduler.LDAP.OldUserCleanupJob.ldapBindDn.existingOk=It looks like there is an useable DN configued in the main LDAP settings; you can leave this field empty to use that DN. org.xwiki.contrib.ldap.scheduler.LDAP.OldUserCleanupJob.ldapBindPass.hint=The password of the user to bind to the LDAP when running the job. ## currently unused #org.xwiki.contrib.ldap.scheduler.LDAP.OldUserCleanupJob.ldapBindPass.existingOk=It looks like there is an useable DN configued in the main LDAP settings; you can leave this field empty to use that Password. org.xwiki.contrib.ldap.scheduler.LDAP.OldUserCleanupJob.replacementUser.hint=The XWiki user to replace deleted users as page creator and last author. This user does not have to exist. org.xwiki.contrib.ldap.scheduler.LDAP.OldUserCleanupJob.replacementAdmin.hint=The XWiki user to replace deleted users as page creator and last author, if the deleted users had the "Program"-right. Choose an existing (but possibly disabled) account that has the "Program"-right, too. Usually choosing ##XWiki.superadmin## is a viable option. org.xwiki.contrib.ldap.scheduler.LDAP.OldUserCleanupJob.replaceCreator.hint=Set this option if deleted users should be replaced as the creator of pages. org.xwiki.contrib.ldap.scheduler.LDAP.OldUserCleanupJob.replaceAuthor.hint=Set this option if deleted users should be replaced as the last author of pages. org.xwiki.contrib.ldap.scheduler.LDAP.OldUserCleanupJob.replaceContentAuthor.hint=Set this option if deleted users should be replaced as the last content author of pages. org.xwiki.contrib.ldap.scheduler.LDAP.OldUserCleanupJob.replaceCommentAuthor.hint=Set this option if deleted users should be replaced as the creator of comments. org.xwiki.contrib.ldap.scheduler.LDAP.OldUserCleanupJob.dryRun.hint=Set this option if you want the job to make no actual changes but only log any actions that would be performed. org.xwiki.contrib.ldap.scheduler.LDAP.OldUserCleanupJob.shouldDisable.hint=Set this option if you want the users to be disabled rather than deleted. org.xwiki.contrib.ldap.scheduler.LDAP.OldUserCleanupJob.activeAttribute.hint=The LDAP attribute that conveys whether an user is active or not. E.g. for Active Directory, the attribute is 'userAccountControl'. org.xwiki.contrib.ldap.scheduler.LDAP.OldUserCleanupJob.inactiveValue.hint=The value of the activeAttribute that determines that an user is inactive/disabled. E.g. in Active Directory, the value for the 'userAccountControl' attribute that says an user is inactive is '514'. # other org.xwiki.contrib.ldap.scheduler.LDAP.OldUserCleanupJob.jobname=Remove profile data for users no longer available in LDAP org.xwiki.contrib.ldap.scheduler.LDAP.OldUserCleanupJob.title=Old User Cleanup Job org.xwiki.contrib.ldap.scheduler.LDAP.OldUserCleanupJob.settings.subtitle=Cleanup Settings org.xwiki.contrib.ldap.scheduler.LDAP.OldUserCleanupJob.settings.loginOk=It looks like there are usable credentials configued in the main LDAP settings; you can leave this field empty to use the main settings. org.xwiki.contrib.ldap.scheduler.LDAP.OldUserCleanupJob.job.subtitle=Scheduler Job Settings
